org.springframework.data.rest.core.invoke

类 RepositoryMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.rest.core.invoke.RepositoryMethod

  • public class RepositoryMethod
extends Object
    An abstraction to encapsulate metadata about a repository method.
    作者:
    Jon Brisbin

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RepositoryMethod(Method method) 

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Method getMethod()
      Get the reflected Method to invoke.
      List<String> getParameterNames()
      Get the method parameter names.
      List<MethodParameter> getParameters()
      Get the method parameter types.
      boolean isPageable()
      Flag denoting whether this repository method returns a Page result or not.
      boolean isSortable()
      Flag denoting whether this repository method accepts sorting information.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RepositoryMethod

        public RepositoryMethod(Method method)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getParameters

        public List<MethodParameter> getParameters()
        Get the method parameter types.
        返回:
        Array of parameter types.

      • getParameterNames

        public List<String> getParameterNames()
        Get the method parameter names.
        返回:
        Array of parameter names.

      • getMethod

        public Method getMethod()
        Get the reflected Method to invoke.
        返回:
        The Method to invoke.

      • isPageable

        public boolean isPageable()
        Flag denoting whether this repository method returns a Page result or not.
        返回:
        true if this method returns a Page, false otherwise.

      • isSortable

        public boolean isSortable()
        Flag denoting whether this repository method accepts sorting information.
        返回:
        true if this method accepts a Sort, false otherwise.
